nodes.text: The SD-54 Neutralization Droid was a model of bipedal battle droid used by the the Shroud, a freelance spy active during the Galactic War. SD-54 Neutralization Droids were among the droid forces that defended the Shroud's factory on the moon Nar Shaddaa.

SD-54 Neutralization Droids appear as enemies in the final macrobinoculars mission—"The Shroud Revealed" for Republic players and "All the Pieces" for Imperials— in Rise of the Hutt Cartel, the first Digital Expansion for the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
